授業目的:
The
purpose of this course is to provide a practical understanding of the internal
and external factors that influence consumer behavior. This course will focus
on consumers as individuals and decision-makers in the 21st century.
到達目標:
Students will
     recognize consumers as individuals and decision-makers.
 Students will
     develop a practical understanding of consumer behavior models and their
     relation to marketing strategies.
 Students will
     enhance their analytical skills to recognize the complexity of consumer
     decision-making in various settings.
 Students will
     develop the ability to use AI tools responsibly and effectively in
     researching contemporary consumer issues
 Students will
     cultivate critical thinking abilities regarding the key forces that
     influence consumer behavior in the digital world

トピック.授業外学習2: Consumer Behavior course is highly recommended for marketing students to acquire a practical understanding about consumers as individuals and decision-makers. Business students who want to comprehend the underlying factors that influence people's behavior are also encouraged to take this course.
